semantic category natural language processing nlp or artificial intelligence ai this category refers to the domain of computer science and artificial intelligence that deals with language processing text understanding natural language understanding machine translation text generation conversational ai sentiment analysis language models etc nlp is a subfield of ai that focuses on the interaction between human languages and computers it involves various tasks such as language translation from one language to another text classification eg spam detection sentiment analysis named entity recognition ner eg identifying people organizations locations question answering qa semantic parsing sp etc ai is a broad field of computer science that deals with the design creation and use of intelligent machines it involves various subfields such as machine learning ml artificial neural networks anns natural language processing nlp robotics computer vision expert systems and quantum computing ai has numerous applications across different industries such as healthcare finance transportation manufacturing retail education entertainment sports etc
